title: The Bell II
marks: Signature, Date and Mark top center, part of engraving: [R.S.A / 1927]
description: image of a large bell surrounded by wooden deck with railing; suspended from straps over wooden board; arched wooden form avobe bell; bell decorated iwth a band of Latin text near the bottom with a cross; artist initials and date included in engraving at very top; on cream colored paper
creditline: Gift of Robert Austin's daughters, Rachel and Clare
